page.title: 16Industry
page.content: in the future. {Golden Lay Yorkshire Egg Producers} began life in 1934 as Poultry Producers(wr) Ltd.It collected eggs from local farmers to pack and sell at the best price for the farmers.Re- organization gave rise to Yorkshire Egg Packers,from 40 local producers.In 1947 it changed to Yorkshire Egg Producers with Goldenlay responsible for packaging and marketing.Eggs are collected from three main producers and distributed to Bradford,Wakefield, Huddersfield and Stockton areas. {Plasticisers Ltd.,}has been in Drighlington since the 19th century when it was a family firm.It was taken over by Readicut in 1970.Production has changed over the years from animal to man-made fibres for making ropes,brushes etc.Raw materials of polymer chips,pigments and addatives
